languages.text: "И какой бы подарок вы выбрали? На месте моего друга, разумеется".

traits.locale_text: "И какой бы подарок вы выбрали? На месте моего друга, разумеется".

languages.text: "And what gift would you choose? If you were my friend, of course."
languages.original_text: "И какой бы подарок вы выбрали? На месте моего друга, разумеется".

traits.locale_text: "And what gift would you choose? If you were my friend, of course."
"And what gift would you choose? If you were my friend, of course."
"And what gift would you choose? If you were my friend, of course."
"And what gift would you choose? If you were my friend, of course."

languages.text: «¿Y qué regalo escogería usted? Si estuviese en el lugar de mi amigo, quiero decir».
languages.original_text: "And what gift would you choose? If you were my friend, of course."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y qué regalo escogería usted? Si estuviese en el lugar de mi amigo, quiero decir».

languages.text: 「お前ならばどんな贈り物を選ぶ？もちろん、私の友人だったならば、という仮定のもとでだ」
languages.original_text: "And what gift would you choose? If you were my friend, of course."

traits.locale_text: 「お前ならばどんな贈り物を選ぶ？もちろん、私の友人だったならば、という仮定のもとでだ」

languages.text: “假如你是我的朋友的话，你会选择什么作为回礼呢？”
languages.original_text: "And what gift would you choose? If you were my friend, of course."

traits.locale_text: “假如你是我的朋友的话，你会选择什么作为回礼呢？”

languages.text: « Quel cadeau choisiriez-vous ? Si vous étiez {mf|mon ami|mon amie}, je veux dire. »
languages.original_text: "And what gift would you choose? If you were my friend, of course."

traits.locale_text: « Quel cadeau choisiriez-vous ? Si vous étiez {mf|mon ami|mon amie}, je veux dire. »

languages.text: "Und welches Geschenk würdet Ihr wählen? Wenn Ihr mein Freund wäret, versteht sich."
languages.original_text: "And what gift would you choose? If you were my friend, of course."

traits.locale_text: "Und welches Geschenk würdet Ihr wählen? Wenn Ihr mein Freund wäret, versteht sich."

languages.text: "Peki nasıl bir hediye seçerdin? Arkadaşımın yerinde olsaydın yani."
languages.original_text: "And what gift would you choose? If you were my friend, of course."

traits.locale_text: "Peki nasıl bir hediye seçerdin? Yani arkadaşımın yerinde olsaydın tabii ki."
